description: Submission of an Internal Building Fabric Assessment pursuant to condition 23 of planning permission ref: 181380FUL dated  22/12/2021 for ' Demolition of existing structures and residential-led, mixed use redevelopment to provide four buildings ranging in height from 15 to 23 storeys comprising residential (575 units), 2,100 sq m of B1(a) office floorspace, 449 sq m of flexible commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1a and D1), erection of a boundary wall along the railway line, along with landscaping, play and amenity space, cycle parking, servicing bays, plant and refuse areas, and new access arrangements (REVISED PROPOSAL DESCRIPTION).'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
